item.title: Working with Python
item.description: This semester, I had the privilege to work with the application Python after having learned more in depth tools about RStudio. Throughout my college career, I had only coded in R, and learning a new language that was more widely known by a larger group of people was exciting to me, as with more practice, Iâ€™d be able to build up my coding language in one that is more readily available to others.
